name: Zeitgeist (itch)
description:
If we seek the singularity we must first overflow the stackus quo! -- Ai M. Yu Yu and I don't always see eye to eye, but that tension is the hidden strength of Cyberpomp Industries. We need his vision, and we need my, uh, willingness to obey the law. -- Marcus Carter Come, let us traverse the inverse, Fracture the fractional, pack the packets for an extended stay. Where we're going, we don't need roads. -- Ai M. Yu You can't seriously think I had something to do with-- that's horrible, I would never-- he was my FRIEND! -- Marcus Carter Good morning, Agent 21. Since this is a prerecorded presentation, I'll skip the pleasantries and get right to it: your new case is the 1998 disappearance of counterculture tech guru Ai M. Yu. Advance the slide.

This is a literal PowerPoint presentation. To play, open START.pptx in the Microsoft PowerPoint desktop app. If you don't have it, you can upload the slides to powerpoint.com for a 90%-as-good experience (I think you'll have to make a microsoft account if you don't have one). If you're playing this way, once you reach the end (the floating payphone), open secret-online.pptx and enter the password.

Don't even try with Google Sheets.

Made for Global Game Jam 2021 with Portland Indie Game Squad.

Theme: Lost and Found

Diversifier: Next Slide, Please (make your game entirely in PowerPoint)
